description:
Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI) calculator
PAIesque calculates your PAI (Personal Activity Intelligence) score and
Resting Heart Rate to provide comprehensive fitness tracking.

PAI translates heart rate data into a simple, scientifically-validated score,
while RHR monitoring helps track your cardiovascular health progress.

You need to install and configure Gadgetbridge to read heart rate data from fitness trackers and smartwatches.
